```
projects
├ <some other projects>...
└── sample-site
       ├── html
       │    └── index.html
       └── Dockerfile
```

```
projects
├ <some other projects>...
├── sample-site
│      ├── html
│      │    └── index.html
│      └── docker
│           └── Dockerfile
└── config
      └── nginx.conf 
```

```
FROM nginx:latest
COPY sample-site/html/* /etc/nginx/html/
COPY config/nginx.conf /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
```

```
$ cd projects
$ docker build -f sample-site/docker/Dockerfile -t sample-site:latest .
```

```
projects
├ <some other projects>...
├── sample-site
│      ├── html
│      │    └── index.html
│      └── docker
│           └── Dockerfile
└── config
       └── nginx.conf
```

```
$ mkdir tmp-context
$ cp -R ../html tmp-context/
$ cp -R ../../config tmp-context/
```

```
FROM nginx:latest
COPY html/* /etc/nginx/html/
COPY config/nginx.conf /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
```
